title: proposal: new import syntax
body:
When you import the module, write the name of the module without the quotes. It looks more natural, because in the future, this module is used in code without the quotes.

Before :
```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Println("Hello, playground")
}
```
After :
```
package main

import fmt

func main() {
	fmt.Println("Hello, playground")
}
```
